trans-unit.source:
\n

This level corresponds to a critical error, which is a serious error that has caused a major failure.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This level adds standard errors that signify a problem.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This level adds informational events or messages that are not errors.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
These events can help trace the progress or state of an application.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

No level filtering is done on the event.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This level adds lengthy events or messages.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
It causes all events to be logged.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This level adds warning events (for example, events that are published because a disk is nearing full capacity).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx$.$$x$$x
